thread.title: USA Today Sports: NCAA Teams ‘Should Boycott’ Arkansas Over Campus Carry
thread.title_full: USA Today Sports: NCAA Teams ‘Should Boycott’ Arkansas Over Campus Carry

author: AWR Hawkins
title: USA Today Sports: NCAA Teams ‘Should Boycott’ Arkansas Over Campus Carry

organizations.name: oklahoma director for students for co

text: In this photo taken Tuesday, March 1, 2011, Adrienne O'Reilly, Oklahoma Director for Students for Concealed Carry on Campus, carries an empty gun holster on the Oklahoma State University campus in Stillwater, Okla. Some Oklahoma college students will be wearing empty gun holsters to show support for proposed legislation that would allow concealed weapons to be carried on school grounds.
